DOC.brief_title: Selective Lymph Node Dissection Using Fluorescent Dye Node-positive Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Low dose indocyanine green emit near-infrared fluorescence , penetrate thin tissue like breast skin . The operator track lymphatic pathway without skin incision real time . By characteristic , indocyanine green currently use sentinel lymph node biopsy breast cancer surgery . Indocyanine green also stain lymph node beyond sentinel lymph node . This identify lymphatic metastasis pathway breast cancer .
